title: Reasons why those of the people called Quakers, challenged by George Keith, to meet him at Turner's Hall the eleventh of this month called June, 1696. refuse their appearance at his peremptory summons.
author: Story, Thomas, 1662-1742.
publisher: Printed by T. Sowle, in White-Hart-Court in Grace-Church-street,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
